quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易将"syphilology"与形近词"philology"（语言学）混淆，或误通过词根"philo-"（爱）推测为"关于爱的研究"。
quiz_item.sentence: Researchers in **syphilology** are working to develop better tests for detecting the disease in its early stages.
